title: MSP investigates hunting death in Noble Township
content:
NOBLE TOWNSHIP - Michigan State Police are investigating an apparent hunting accident that left one family member dead Saturday night.
Three members of a family were hunting at sunset on Gunthorp Road at the state line. At least one shot had been fired.
At dark, the father and son went to check on the grandfather in his tree stand. They found blood at the base.
After getting the eldest man to the ground, they began CPR and just after 6 p.m. called Bronson Fire Department medical first responders to the scene near Brown Lake. The man, who has not been identified, was pronounced dead at the scene.
Michigan State Police are investigating.
